Default Linux kernel: By default Linux-libre , but the Debian Project also hosts a non-free repository allowing blobs to be installed optionally . Built with Linux-libre tools

Install-time desktop environment or wind: GNOME ( default Workstation Edition ) , Spins for : KDE Plasma Workspaces , Xfce , LXDE , MATE ( with Compiz ) , Cinnamon , Sugar on a Stick
Awesome , Enlightenment , Fluxbox , GNOME , KDE , LXDE-Meta , Openbox , XBMC and Xfce ( live DVD )

Default Linux kernel: Debian Linux kernel , and ( unlike Debian ) blobs can not be installed
